---
title: "Marco Zanotti's CV"
author: Marco Zanotti
date: "`r Sys.Date()`"
params:
  pdf_mode:
    value: false
  lang:
    value: 'en'
  resume:
    value: false
output:
  pagedown::html_resume:
    css: ['cv.css', 'resume']
    self_contained: true
---

```{r, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  results = 'asis', 
  echo = FALSE
)

library(magrittr) # For the pipe
source("C:/Users/marco.zanotti/Documents/RProjects/website/R/cv_printing_functions.r")

if (params$lang == "en") {
  Sys.setlocale("LC_ALL", "us")
} else {
  Sys.setlocale("LC_ALL", "Italian_Italy.1252")
}

# Read in all data and initialize a CV printer object
cv <- create_cv_object(
  data_location = "https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1FwVp14baq9CeUS2x8nniXf9tBCBc3hJJxbbH3DDZziY/edit?usp=sharing"
  ) %>% 
  clean_cv_object(language = params$lang, resume = params$resume)
```

```{r}
# When in pdf export mode the little dots are unaligned, so fix that with some conditional CSS.
if (params$pdf_mode) {
    cat("
<style>
:root{
  --decorator-outer-offset-left: -6.5px;
}
</style>")
}
```
